UI Designer

Hi! I'm Eric Blake. I have a passion for UI Design. I believe in designing clean layouts that promote both a memorable and beneficial User Experience for all those that see my webpages.

There has never been a way to reach and connect with others quite like the web. We can design in a way that changes lives for the better.
